channel.title: F1Tenth on Jiyoon Park
channel.description: Recent content in F1Tenth on Jiyoon Park

item.title: F1tenth Race Car
item.description: About The Project Implemented various algorithm to conduct F1Tenth Racing including pure pursuit, RRT, and RRT*. Built With Python NumPy Emergency Braking Implemented Emergency Braking for the car using LiDAR scans and calculating the instantaneous Time to Collision (iTTC). Wall Following Implemented PID control in the time domain to give commands to the vehicle to follow the wall. Used LiDAR data to calculate the distance from the wall. $$ u(t)=K_{p}e(t)+K_{i}\int_{0}^{t}e(t^{\prime})dt^{\prime}+K_{d}\frac{d}{dt}(e(t)) $$
